mapper.select: SELECT c.code,c.id,c.`wxuser_Id`,c.`status`,c.`create_Date`,c.update_Date,w.`game_Name` AS gamex_name,w.`id` AS gamex_id FROM wx_game w, wx_game_code c WHERE w.`id`=c.`game_id` and w.id=#{id}
SELECT c.code,c.id FROM wx_game_code c WHERE c.`status`='Y' AND c.`wxuser_Id` IS NULL ORDER BY c.`create_Date` LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE wx_game_code c SET c.`status` = 'N' ,c.`wxuser_Id`=#{wxuserId} ,c.`update_date`=SYSDATE() WHERE id=#{id} ;
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wx_game_code c WHERE c.`wxuser_Id`=#{wxuserId} AND c.`game_id`=#{gameid}
